item.resourcefulbees.information.bee_box: 길을 잃은 벌들이 들어있습니다. 웅크린 채로 사용하면 풀어줍니다. (사용 시 사라짐)
벌을 10마리까지 담을 수 있습니다. 웅크린 채로 사용하면 풀어줍니다.
tooltip.resourcefulbees.jei.click_bee_in: 자세한 내용을 보려면 클릭하거나 마우스 오른쪽 버튼을 클릭하세요!
gui.resourcefulbees.jei.category.mutatio: 벌 블록 돌연변이는 꿀벌이 들어갈 유효한 벌통이 있어야 하고 꽃꿀이 있어야 합니다..
gui.resourcefulbees.jei.category.breed_c: 새로운 벌을 만드는 데 성공할 확률.
이 오라는 벌의 오라 범위 내에 있는 모든 플레이어를 불태웁니다.
이 오라는 꿀벌의 오라 범위 내에 있는 모든 플레이어에게 §5%s§7를 부여합니다.
이 오라는 꿀벌의 오라 범위 내에 있는 모든 플레이어에게 §2%d§7 체력을 부여합니다..
이 오라는 꿀벌의 오라 범위 내에 있는 모든 플레이어에게 §4%d§7의 피해를 줍니다.
이 오라는 벌의 오라 범위 내의 모든 플레이어에게 §a%d§7 경험치를 부여합니다.
이 오라는 꿀벌의 오라 범위 내의 모든 플레이어에게 §c%d§7 경험치를 제거합니다.
gui.resourcefulbees.tab.traits.aura.not_: 이 오라는 진정 효과에 의해 비활성화되지 §4않습니다§7. 이 특성이 있는 벌 주변에서는 조심하세요.
이 오라는 진정 효과에 의해 비활성화되지 않습니다.
gui.resourcefulbees.tab.traits.aura.calm: 이 오라는 진정 효과에 의해 비활성화됩니다.
수분 당 수행할 수 있는 돌연변이의 양.
block.resourcefulbees.apiary.tooltip.tag: 멀티 블럭은 valid_apairy 태그가 있는 어떠한 블럭으로도 지을 수 있습니다.
block.resourcefulbees.apiary.tooltip.off: 오프셋은 바라보는 방향에 따라 양봉장 블럭의 위치를 결정합니다.
block.resourcefulbees.apiary.tooltip.loc: Bees must be locked and selected to export.
item.resourcefulbees.smoker.tooltip: 벌통을 마우스 오른쪽 버튼으로 클릭하여 훈연하세요.
item.resourcefulbees.smoker.tooltip.1: 30초 동안 벌집을 얻을 때 벌이 화를 내지 않을 것입니다.
trait.resourcefulbees.special.teleport: 낮 동안 이 벌은 4블록 이내의 빈 위치로 무작위로 순간이동할 수 있습니다. 이 능력은 엔더 벌호기 및 벌통으로 멈출 수 있습니다.
trait.resourcefulbees.special.flammable: 이 효과는 무작위로 벌에 불을 붙입니다.
trait.resourcefulbees.special.angry: 이 효과를 가진 꿀벌은 공격적이 되어 주변의 꿀벌이 합류하게 됩니다. 당신을 공격할 수 있고 공격할 것입니다. 진정 효과는 화내는 것을 막습니다.
trait.resourcefulbees.special.slimy: 끈적끈적한 꿀벌은 질퍽한 소리를 내고 무작위로 점액 입자를 분출합니다..
trait.resourcefulbees.special.spider: 벌이 아무문제 없이 거미줄 사이를 지나다니게 합니다.
trait.resourcefulbees.special.clingy: 이 특성을 가진 꿀벌은 무슨 일이 있어도 당신을 따를 것입니다. 당신을 안아주고 싶어합니다.
block.resourcefulbees.mech_centrifuge.to: Shift 키를 누른 상태에서 블록을 마우스 오른쪽 버튼으로 클릭하여 벌집 처리.
꿀이 든 병들을 사용하여 RF를 생산합니다.
item.resourcefulbees.scraper.tooltip: 티어가 있는 벌집을 마우스 오른쪽 버튼으로 클릭하여 벌집을 수집합니다.
item.resourcefulbees.scraper.tooltip.1: 벌이 새로운 벌집을 생성하려면 모든 벌집을 수집해야 합니다!
block.resourcefulbees.apiary_breeder.too: 양봉장 멀티블록의 일부로써 추가할 수 있는 선택적인 번식기
추가적인 양육기나 시간 수정자로 업그레이드할 수 있습니다.
block.resourcefulbees.centrifuge.tooltip: 원심분리기 멀티블록의 크기는 3x4x3 이며, 하나의 컨트롤러와 나머지 케이스로 이루어져있습니다.
컨트롤러는 한 면의 중앙에서 아래쪽에서 한 블록 위에 위치해야 합니다.
멀티블록의 어느 블록이든 아이템과 에너지를 넣거나 뺄 수 있습니다.
item.resourcefulbees.hive_upgrade.toolti: 전 티어의 벌통에 사용하여 업그레이드 하세요.
book.resourcefulbees.name: 벌의 50가지 그림자
book.resourcefulbees.landing_text: 다재다능한 양봉가를 환영합니다! 이 안내서는 벌에 대한 에로티시즘보다 양봉에 대한 정보로 가득 차 있습니다. 저희는 이 안내서가 기본적인 이해에 도움이 되길 바랍니다.$(br)$(o)$(#ff0000)전부는 아닐지라도 대부분의 꿀벌은 팩 개발자가 추가한다는 점을 명심하세요!$()
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.des: 이 섹션에서는 이 모드를 시작하는 방법, 벌을 찾고 포획하는 방법, 안전하게 보관하는 방법, 만난 벌을 추적하는 방법에 대해 설명합니다.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.fin: 꿀벌은 벌집 안에서 찾을 수 있으며, 다른 몹처럼 생성되어 떠돌아다니는 것도 볼 수 있습니다.$(br2)꿀벌이 생성될 수 있는 위치를 찾으려면 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)벌피디아$() 또는 JEI에서 벌을 검색하여 찾을 수 있습니다.
일부 꿀벌은 자연적으로 생성되지 않으며 대신 번식시켜야 합니다. 벌 번식에 대한 더 많은 정보를 $(thing)$(l:getting_started/breeding_bees)여기$()에서 찾을 수 있습니다.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.col: 꿀벌을 찾으면 수집하여 집으로 가져가고 싶을 것입니다.$(br2)이걸 할 수 있는 많은 방법이 있지만, 최고의 방법은 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/bee_jar)벌 병$()이나 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/bee_box)벌 상자$()를 이용하는 것입니다.$(br2)끈이나 벌의 번식 아이템을 이용하는 좀 더 전통적인 방법을 쓸 수도 있습니다.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.und: 일단 벌이 있으면 벌이 무엇을 할 수 있고 무엇을 해야하는 지 알고 싶을 것입니다.$(br2)$(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)벌피디아$()를 만들면 각 꿀벌이 할 수 있는 일에 대해 더 많이 배울 수 있습니다. 벌에 $(thing)오른쪽 클릭$()을 하면 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)벌피디아$()의 그 벌의 페이지를 펼칠 수 있습니다.
JEI를 사용하여 꿀벌에 대한 정보를 검색할 수도 있습니다.$(br2)벌은 $(thing)오른쪽 클릭$()과 $(thing)왼쪽 클릭$() 용도가 모두 있다는 것을 명심하세요. 꿀벌의 생성 알이나 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/bee_jar)벌 병$() 의 용도를 보면 벌을 번식시키거나 얻는 방법에 대한 정보를 찾을 수도 있습니다.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.kee: 벌은 귀엽지만 자기만의 마음이 있기 때문에 벌을 위한 장소를 만들고 싶어질 것입니다.$(br2)First you're going to want to gather yourself some $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beehives)Bee Hives$() and then you are going to want to make an enclosed area so they can't fly away.$(br2)
일부 벌은 특별한 꽃을 가지고 있으며, 벌은 올바른 꽃이 없으면 수분을 하거나 벌집을 만들 수 없고 만들지 않을 것입니다.$(br2)$(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)비피디아$()나 JEI로 각 벌들이 꽃으로써 필요한 것이 무엇인지 확인하세요.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.col: You take the comb and you take the hun.
벌집이 꿀 레벨 5에 도달하면 꿀 수확을 시작할 수 있습니다. $(or)가위$() 또는 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/scraper)스크레이퍼$()를 사용하면 벌집을 주을 수 있도록 세상에 나올 것입니다.$(br2)$(#900)먼저 벌통을 훈연하는 것을 잊지 마세요!$()
$(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beehives)벌집/$ 자동화는 $(or)깔때기/$나 모든 종류의 레드스톤 시계를 $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/scraper)스크레이퍼/$를 사용하는 $(or)공급기/$와 함께 사용하여 쉽게 수행할 수 있습니다.$(p)이렇게 하면 벌집을 훈연할 필요 없이 모든 벌집들을 수확할 것입니다.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.pro: All you have to do is take a cup of combs, add it to the mix.

To start off with, you will have to craft a $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/mechanical_centrifuge)Manual Centrifuge/$. You can then place your honeycombs and empty bottles in it to be processed.$(p)Note that only the multiblock centrifuges will take honeycomb blocks.$(p)You will need some $(or)Wax$() in order to craft the higher tier centrifuges.
book.resourcefulbees.getting_started.bre: Bee breeding works very much like vanilla breeding, with one notable exception. Some bees may require multiple $(or)Breed items$() in order to fall in love.$(br2)The $(or)Breed item$() wont always bee a flower.$(br2)You can check what a bee needs to breed in the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)Beepedia$() or with JEI.

Sometimes bees are obtainable through other means, sometimes this is through $(thing)$(l:advanced_tips/mutations)Mutations$(), and sometimes it's through less conventional means.$(br2)Your best bet to find out how to get a bee is through the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)Beepedia$() and or looking at the bee's tooltip.
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.desc: This section will go into advanced sections of the mod that you may encounter once you have gotten your bees set up.
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.apiar: Home is where the heart bee.

The $(or)Apiary/$ is the next upgrade for the $(thing)$(l:getting_started/keeping_bees)Beehives/$. $(p)It can house more bees, produce more honeycombs and make $(thing)$(l:getting_started/breeding_bees)Breeding/$ easier.$(br2)The apiary is part of a 7 x 7 x 5 multiblock which contains the main $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiaries)Apiary Block$() and an $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_storage)Apiary Storage Block$() and an optional $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_breeder)Apiary Breeder$() and some solid blocks.

Once placed down the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiaries)Apiary$() can then be set up to show a preview of the structure.$(br2)Blocks must be placed to fill the structure, you can use any blocks with collision or anything marked with the valid_apiary tag.$(br2)The $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_storage)Apiary Storage/$ and $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_breeder)Apiary Breeder/$ can be placed anywhere in the multiblock's walls.

The $(or)Apiary/$ comes with some restrictions: it can only house 9 unique bees, which means no more than one of the same type of bee in the $(or)Apiary/$ at any one time.$(br2) however you can get past this limitation by keeping bees inside the enclosure.

When honeycombs are produced by the bees, they will show up in the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_storage)Apiary Storage/$, which can then be removed manually, or automated via $(or)Hoppers/$ or pipes from other mods.

The $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_breeder)Apiary Breeder/$ will make breeding easier by allowing you to place the two bees, together with their food and a jar, inside it and not have the hassle of running around after them.$(p)If the breeding is successful, the new bee will be placed in the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_storage)Apiary Storage/$.
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.calmi: Double double sweet and runny pint of wart and drop of honey.
The Calming effect when applied to bees will prevent them from getting angry, it will also calm bees down if they are already angry.

If a bee has the Angry trait it will calm them down, allowing you to keep them around other bees.$(br2)Bees can be granted the Calming effect in two ways, one is via a $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/calming_potions)Splash Potion of Calming$() or by using an $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/ender_beecon)Ender Beecon$().
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.auras: Auras are a special effect granted by various traits.$(br2)Auras are Area of Effects that occur once every $(or)8 seconds$() centered on the bee.$(br2)Auras can do all kinds of things from giving potion effects to granting xp and even setting you on fire.

The range of each Aura is determined by the bee.$(br2)Some auras can be disabled by the calming effect so it's best to check what each aura can do before encountering a bee with one.$(br2)You can search for bees with an aura by searching $(thing)#aura$() in the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)Beepedia$().
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.anger: One thing to always avoid doing is hitting your bees or harvesting hives without smoking first. Else you will incurr the wrath of your buzzy friends.$(br2)If bees become angry they will try to sting you and depending on the bee if they sting you they will likely lose their stinger.

Another thing to watch out for is bees with the $(thing)Angry Trait$() as they can only be calmed down with the $(or)$(l:advanced_tips/calming)Calming Effect$().$(br2)Another thing to note is that angry bees will also anger other bees around them so watch out.
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.trait: Traits are special features that each bee can have multiple of.$(br2)Traits allow for various things such as various Immunities, damage types, damage effects, particles and more.$(br2)You can find out more about traits in the Traits section of the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)Beepedia$().
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.power: You spin bee right round baby right round.

Once you have some power set up you are going to want to start using a $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools:centrifuge)Centrifuge$()$(br2)Powered Centrifuges can process combs that have liquids as well as items as outputs and have an internal storage tank that stores said liquids.

The next tier of centrifuge is the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/multiblock_centrifuge)Multiblock Centrifuge$(), This centrifuge can process the block forms of honeycombs and has more storage and input slots.$(br2)This Centrifuge also has an increased processing speed compaired to the basic $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/centrifuge)Centrifuge$().

The final tier of centrifuge is the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/elite_centrifuge)Elite Centrifuge$() which has the most input slots, most storage out of all of the centrifuges.$(br2)The processing speed for this centrifuge is twice as fast as the regular $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/multiblock_centrifuge)Multiblock Centrifuge$().
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.gener: Honey has untapped potential which we can harvest to create power using the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/honey_generator)Honey Generator$().$(br2)If you don't have access to energy transfer you can still utilise the generator by simply placing the block next to the $(or)$(l:advanced_tips/powered_centrifuges)Centrifuge$() you want to process with.
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.mutat: Mutations are a bees way of changing the world around it.$(br2)Once a bee has pollen if a bee also has any mutations if it then flies over a block or entity it can mutate it will try to change it into something else.$(br2)There are three types of mutations, Block, Item, and Entity.
If you want to figure out what mutation each bee has you can check via the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beepedia)Beepedia$() or through JEI.
book.resourcefulbees.advanced_tips.ender: Are you looking to protect your bees or grant some effects?

The Ender Beecon can grant up to 4 different effects at once, each effect requiring more and more honey to keep it active.$(br2)Effects:$(or)$(li)$(l:advanced_tips/calming)Calming$()$(or)$(li)Fire Resistance$()$(or)$(li)Water Breathing$()$(or)$(li)Regeneration$()
By default when the beecon has honey in it it will stop bees with the $(thing)$(l:advanced_tips/traits)Ender Trait$() from teleporting when it's within the beecon's effective range.

The Ender Beecon can be filled directly with $(or)Honey bottles$() or $(or)Buckets of Honey$()$(br2)It can also fill itself from any $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/honey_tanks)Tanks$() placed below it provided said tank has enough honey.

The color of the beecon's beam is set to match the color of the honey that is inside, the exception being $(or)Vanilla$(), or $(or)Catnip$() honey which will show up as white.$(br2)You can also chose to silence or remove the beam from the beecon with the interface.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.de: This section will go in depth about all of the items and blocks you can use to enhance your beekeeping journey.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.be: Bee jars are able to hold a single bee, simply $(thing)Right Click$() on a bee to collect it.$(br2)Releasing bees is done via another $(thing)Right Click$().
Bee jars can also be renamed in an $(or)Anvil$() to which will rename the bee inside.

Bee boxes are able to hold up to 10 bees at a time, simply $(thing)Right Click$() on a bee to collect it. They can also collect bees from $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beehives)Bee Hives, Nests, or Apiaries$(), simply $(thing)Sneak Right Click$() on a nest to collect all bees inside. $(br2)$(#900)Don't forget to smoke the hive first!$()
To release bees simply $(thing)Right Click$() to release a single bee, to release all bees at once use $(thing)Sneak Right Click$().
Bees need places to live, these nests and hives can be upgraded to store even more bees and combs.
Bee Nests can be found around the world, you can pick them up without $(thing)Silk Touch$() but if you use $(thing)Silk Touch$() you will collect any bees inside.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.sc: The $(or)Scraper/$ is an unbreakable tool that can be used to harvest $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beehives)Bee Hives$().$(br2)The scraper can also be used in a $(or)Dispenser$() the same way $(or)Shears$() can.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.sm: The $(or)Smoker/$ is a simple tool, if you use it on a $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/beehives)Bee Hive$() it will smoke it, preventing bees from angering if you attempt to harvest or collect the bees with a $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools:bee_box)Bee Box$().
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.be: The $(or)Beepedia/$ is an amazing tool that allows you to find out anything you should need to know about bees.$(br2)If you $(thing)Right Click$() on a bee with this item you will open that bee's page and record it's data for later.
The information stored within the beepedia is saved per player and will be kept even if you lose the item.
The Beepedia allows you to search for bees combs or honey via the search box.$(br2)You can also use special search terms to filter bees by certain criteria.

$(#F80)#discovered$()$(br)- Bees that you have discovered.$(br2)$(#F80)#unknown$()$(br)-  Bees that you have yet to discover.$(br2)$(#F80)#mutates$()$(br)- Bees that have mutations.$(br2)$(#F80)#breedable$()$(br)- Bees that can be bred.

$(#F80)#spawns$()$(br)- Bees that spawn in the world.$(br2)$(#F80)#aura$()$(br)- Bees that have a $(thing)$(l:advanced_tips/auras)Special Aura$().$(br2)$(#F80)#easter$()$(br)- Easter Egg bees added by devs or Patrens.$(br2)$(#F80)#special$()$(br)- Bees that likely have special methods to obtain.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ho: The $(or)Honey Dipper/$ is a special tool that allows you to direct bees.$(br2)You can set where a bee's hive or flower position is, allowing for you to split up bees if they all crowd around a single flower.
To change a bee's settings simply $(thing)Right Click$() on a bee and then $(thing)Right Click$() on a hive or flower.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ca: Calming Potions are potions that give things the calming effect, however the $(thing)$(l:advanced_tips/calming)Calming Effect$() has no effects on players but it does on neutral mobs, so splash or lingering Calming potions are your best friend.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.en: The Ender Beecon is a device that takes honey to power it and gives bees within range effects that help keep them safe.$(br2)You can find more about it $(thing)$(l:advanced_tips/ender_beecon)in Advanced Tips$()
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ho: The $(or)Honey Tanks/$ can hold a certain amount of liquid honey.$(p)There are three tiers, each with their own capacity:$(li1)Wooden: 8,000mb$(li1)Nether: 32,000mb$(li1)Purpur: 128,000mb
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.bo: The $(or)Bottomless Honey Pot/$ is a tank that will delete any liquid honey put in it.$(p)It is meant for automation with pipes, where you can delete excess honey.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ho: The $(or)Honey Congealer/$ is a simple block that requires no power. It will turn liquid honey into their respective honey blocks.$(p)Best to use with pipes from other mods.

The $(or)Honey Glass/$ is a special type of glass that let either players or bees to go through it.$(p)It is suitable for $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiaries)Apiaries$() so players can go in and out of the multiblock without breaking the walls or adding doors.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ap: The $(or)Apiary/$ block is the main part of the apiary multiblock. You must also use an $(thing)$(l:beekeeping_tools/apiary_storage)Apiary Storage$() for the multiblock.$(p)For more info on the multiblock and how it works, click $(thing)$(l:advanced_tips/apiaries)here$().

You can upgrade the $(or)Apiary Breeder/$ with $(or)Breeder Upgrade/$ and $(or)Breed Time Upgrade/$.$(p)They add more slots and also reduce the time needed for the breed.$(p)You can have up to four upgrades at any time.

The $(or)Apiary Storage/$ is the block where all the $(or)Apiary/$ resources will go to.$(p)You can manually take out the items, or automate it with a $(or)Hopper/$.$(p)Each $(or)Apiary/$ must have one $(or)Apiary Storage/$.
You can use $(or)Storage Upgrades/$ to increase the number of slots.$(p)You can only have one upgrade and a choice of four tiers.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ho: The $(or)Honey Generator/$ will turn liquid honey into power.$(br2)Honey can be added by using $(or)Honey Bottles$() or $(or)Buckets of Honey$() on it or inserted into the interface.$(br2)You can also add honey directly with pipes.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.me: The $(or)Manual Centrifuge/$ is the most basic type of centrifuge.$(br)It requires no power, but you will have to actively turn it by holding down $(thing)Shift$() + $(thing)Right Click$().$(p)It is limited to only processing honeycombs, not blocks.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.ce: The $(or)Centrifuge/$ will use RF to turn your combs into resources.$(p)There is a limitation that it can only process honeycombs, not blocks.$(p)This process can be automated with $(or)Hoppers/$.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.mu: The $(or)Multiblock Centrifuge/$ is an upgraded version of the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/centrifuge)Centrifuge/$ that will increase the amount of resources from the processing of combs and allow processing of comb blocks as well.$(p)This process can be automated with $(or)Hoppers/$.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.el: The $(or)Elite Centrifuge/$ is an upgraded version of the $(or)$(l:beekeeping_tools/multiblock_centrifuge)Multiblock Centrifuge/$.$(p)This process can be automated with $(or)Hoppers/$.
book.resourcefulbees.beekeeping_tools.wa: Have excess wax? Why not make some waxed planks?
book.resourcefulbees.extras.desc: This section is for extra stuff you can do with this mod.$(br2)Helpful Links:$(li)$(6)$(l:https://discord.com/invite/resourcefulbees)Discord$()$(li)$(6)$(l:https://patreon.resourcefulbees.com)Patreon$()$(li)$(6)$(l:https://github.com/Resourceful-Bees/ResourcefulBees)Github$()$(li)$(6)$(l:https://wiki.resourcefulbees.com)Wiki$()
book.resourcefulbees.extras.dev_bees.1: The Epic oreo is a master class cookie that will give you vast power.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.dev_bees.2: Kitten bees produce $(or)Catnip Honey$() which you can drink to gain catlike powers for 2 minutes.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.dev_bees.3: The yeti bee doesn't have a special item but it can freeze water.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.dev_bees.4: Starry honey is a special honey that when you gather enough of it the $(thing)Starry Bee$() can trasmute it into a $(or)Nether Star$().
book.resourcefulbees.extras.dev_bees.5: Strawbeerry Milkshake is a sweet little snack that will give you hops.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.patreon.1: If you donate to our $(6)$(l:https://patreon.resourcefulbees.com)Patreon$() you can recive one of the following bees as a little pet that will circle around you.$(br2)If you donate to our highest tier you can make one of your own bees, which we will also add into the game.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.patreon.base: This bee can be any color you want.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.making_your_: Can Bee whatever you want it to Bee.

The first thing you are going to want to do to make your own bee is to have a look at the $(item)$(l:https://github.com/Resourceful-Bees/ResourcefulBees/blob/1.16.5/dev_resources/Bee_Creation_Guide.json)Bee_Creation_Guide.json on our github$()$(br2)This guide will give you information on all of the default values our bees use as well as some tips on how to use each value.

$(item)$(l:https://github.com/Resourceful-Bees/ResourcefulBees/tree/1.16.5/src/main/resources/assets/resourcefulbees/textures/entity/template_textures)Click here$() to find all of the template textures you can use for each of our custom model types.$(br2)You are going to want to chose a base and a template, combine the two textures together to start making your own.$(br2)On the next page is links to all of the custom models we add.

$(li)$(item)$(l:https://www.blockbench.net/)Block Bench$()$(br)The go too tool for custom model making for minecraft.$(br)$(li)$(item)$(l:https://www.getpaint.net/)Paint.NET$()$(br)A simple free image editor.$(br)$(li)$(item)$(l:https://atom.io/)Atom$()$(br)An excellent text editor with lots of plugins.
book.resourcefulbees.extras.credits.text: $(or)Crispy Oreo$()$(br)   Lead Developer$(br2) $(or)ThatGravyBoat$()$(br)   Developer$(br2) $(or)Dawn Felstar$()$(br)   Developer, Artist$(br2) $(or)Joosh$()$(br)   Artist$(br2) $(or)Lady Lexxie$()$(br)   Official Pack Dev
